SELECT c.CHATROOM_ID, c.CHATROOM_CHANNEL_ID, c.CHATROOM_WRITER_NICKNAME, c.CHATROOM_TITLE, c.CHATROOM_REGDATE FROM MEMBER AS m INNER JOIN CHATROOM_MEMBER AS cm ON m.MEMBER_ID = cm.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN CHATROOM AS c ON cm.CHATROOM_ID = c.CHATROOM_ID WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, p.PROFILE_ID, p.MEMBER_ID, p.PROFILE_STATE_MESSAGE, p.PROFILE_UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, p.PROFILE_STORE_FILE_NAME FROM CHATROOM AS c INNER JOIN CHATROOM_MEMBER as cm ON c.CHATROOM_ID = cm.CHATROOM_ID INNER JOIN MEMBER AS m ON cm.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN PROFILE AS p ON m.MEMBER_ID = p.MEMBER_ID WHERE c.CHATROOM_CHANNEL_ID = #{chatroomChannelId}
